biotools.summary:
It is a pipeline to reconcile cluster solutions from multiple clustering algorithms.
    It allows the user to apply multiple clustering algorithms to a dataset, then performs multiple reconciliations to understand the relationships between the solutions.

bioschemas.name: polyClustR
